```{r message = FALSE}
AL_files_entropy <- list.files(params$AL_entropy_path, full.names = TRUE, pattern = "tsv")
AL_entropy <- lapply(AL_files_entropy, read_tsv) %>% 
  bind_rows() %>% 
  mutate(method = gsub("Active-Learning-groundTruth-strategy-", "", method)) %>% 
  separate(method, into = c('strategy', 'al', 'AL_alg', 'r', 'random', 'c', 'corrupted'), sep = '-') %>% 
  select(-c(al, r, c))

AL_files_maxp <- list.files(params$AL_maxp_path, full.names = TRUE, pattern = "tsv")
AL_maxp <- lapply(AL_files_maxp, read_tsv) %>% 
  bind_rows() %>% 
  mutate(method = gsub("Active-Learning-groundTruth-strategy-", "", method)) %>% 
  separate(method, into = c('strategy', 'al', 'AL_alg', 'r', 'random', 'c', 'corrupted'), sep = '-') %>% 
  select(-c(al, r, c))
```

## Entropy
### RF
```{r fig.width=13, fig.height=20}
save.image('debug-corruption.Rdata')
AL_alluvial <- function(AL, modality){
  AL %>% 
    pivot_longer(c(cell_type, corrupted_cell_type), names_to = "gt_or_mutated", values_to = "cell_type") %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = gt_or_mutated, stratum = cell_type, fill = cell_type, alluvium = cell_id)) +
    geom_stratum() +
    geom_flow() +
    scale_fill_manual(values = cell_type_colours(modality)) +
    whatsthatcell_theme() +
    facet_grid(random + strategy ~ corrupted, scales = "free_y") +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust = 1))
}

lapply(unique(AL_entropy$cell_num), function(x){
  df <- AL_entropy %>% 
    filter(AL_alg == 'rf', cell_num == x)
  AL_alluvial(df, params$modality)
})
```

